DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether any of the lesion(s) were in a previously reported anatomic site.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the diagnosis of lesion in a prior location.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any observable abnormal structural change in a bodily part.

Concepts.definition: Any observable abnormal structural change in a bodily part.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were any of the new lesion(s)
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were any of the new lesion(s) in a previously reported anatomic site

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Metastases located within 3 cm of the previously irradiated structures as defined in the Ineligibility section of the protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Metastases located within 3 cm of the previously irradiated structures if not a candidate for surgery for these lesions as defined in the Ineligibility section of the protocol?
